mapper.sql: id, roleId, kangXingTotal, kangXing, date, status, custom1, custom2, custom3
mapper.select: select kangXing,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal from (SELECT kangXing,xiaoGuo FROM baoshi b where id in ( SELECT baoShi1 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi2 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi3 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 ) and status=1 union all select kangXing,wqXiaoGuo xiaoGuo FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all (SELECT kangXing,kangXingTotal xiaoGuo FROM role_new_shuxing r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status=#{1,jdbcType=INTEGER})) a group by kangXing
mapper.insert:
insert into role_new_shuxing
id,
roleId,
kangXingTotal,
kangXing,
date,
status,
custom1,
custom2,
custom3,

mapper.update:
update role_new_shuxing
roleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kangXingTotal = #{kangxingtotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kangXing = #{kangxing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom1 = #{custom1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom2 = #{custom2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom3 = #{custom3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update role_new_shuxing set roleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kangXingTotal = #{kangxingtotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kangXing = #{kangxing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom1 = #{custom1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom2 = #{custom2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom3 = #{custom3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
